titles.title: In That Day Shall This Song Be Sung

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
In that day shall this song be sung
In the land of Judah.
In that day shall this song be sung
In the land of Judah.
In that day shall this song be sung
In the land of Judah.
We have a strong city.
Chorus:
Open ye gates that the
Righteous nation which keepeth the truth
May enter in, may enter in.
Open ye gates that the
Righteous nation which keepeth the truth
May enter in, may enter in.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Though wilt keep him in perfect peace
Whose mind is stayed on Thee. (3x)
Because he trusteth in Thee.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Cantarán este cántico en tierra de Judá
Cantarán este cántico en tierra de Judá.
Cantarán este cántico en tierra de Judá,
porque fuerte Ciudad tenemos.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
/Abrid las puertas
y la gente justa entrará
guardadora de la verdad/ (2)

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
/Guardarás en completa paz
a aquel que piensa en tí/ (3)
porque en tí solo ha confiado.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
/Salvación ha puesto Dios
por muros y antemuros/ (3)
porque fuerte ciudad tenemos
